document.full_text: world number one rafa nadal underlined his crushing dominance on clay when he overwhelmed spanish compatriot david ferrer 6-2 6-4 to win a sixth barcelona open title in seven years on sunday.
document.title: nadal floors ferrer to win sixth barcelona title
lines_and_colors: world number one rafa nadal underlined his crushing dominance on clay when he overwhelmed spanish compatriot david ferrer 6-2 6-4 to win a sixth barcelona open title in seven years on sunday.
